function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accumulated surface contamination from interactable objects","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission from contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of interactable objects","Technologies":"Antimicrobial surface coatings, UV-C disinfection","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Lack of interface for customizing contexts","Impact":"Inability to tailor analysis to specific building usage patterns","Mitigation":"Develop and implement an interface for customizing contexts in the front-end","Technologies":"User interface design tools, software development","People":"System users, building managers","Owner":"Software development team"},{"Description":"Manual assignment of tags to 3D objects","Impact":"Potential for human error and inconsistent data mapping","Mitigation":"Implement an automated tagging system for 3D objects based on predefined criteria","Technologies":"Machine learning, computer vision","People":"System users, data analysts","Owner":"Technology development team"}]}
